column4: for suspend to work properly; do i need 1) same amount of swap as ram?  i have 8gb of ram; but only 4gb of swap?  2) free space = ram working set?  i regularly use 4-5gb of ram; but currently only have 3gb free on hard disk
you only need enough swap space, no need for other free space on the disk.
ideally it should be at least the same as your RAM, but if you're using little RAM, then it might work with less.
so i dont have enough free swap space?
